parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.21

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets waypoint position <br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title> Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is identical to <tt>[[setWaypointPosition]] [pos, -1]</tt> (see command description for more info)</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''setWPPos''' pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGL]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_groupOne, 1] [[setWPPos]] [[markerPos]] "MarkerOne";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypoints]], [[waypointSpeed]]
</value></part></template>
